title: OpenSSL Buffer Overflow
description: A buffer overflow vulnerability in OpenSSL allows attackers to execute arbitrary code.

title: Apache HTTP Server Path Traversal
description: Improper sanitization in Apache HTTP Server may lead to path traversal.

title: Linux Kernel Race Condition
description: A race condition in the Linux Kernel leads to privilege escalation.

title: MySQL Authentication Bypass
description: In some configurations, MySQL fails to properly verify user credentials.

title: MongoDB Denial of Service
description: A crafted query in MongoDB may cause service interruption.

title: Nginx Memory Leak
description: A memory leak in Nginx causes performance degradation over time.

title: Docker Container Breakout
description: An issue in Docker may allow escape from container to host environment.

title: Windows RDP Heap Overflow
description: Heap overflow vulnerability in RDP may allow remote code execution.

title: WordPress Plugin SQL Injection
description: An insecure plugin in WordPress allows SQL injection via user input.

title: Python `pickle` RCE
description: Improper use of `pickle` module may result in remote code execution.
